location.Description: The location of the resource. This will be one of the supported and registered Azure Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.). The region of a resource cannot be changed once it is created, but if an identical region is specified on update the request will succeed.

tags.Description: The list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups).

identity.Description: Msi identity details of the resource

name.Description: The sku name. Possible values include: 'DataBox', 'DataBoxDisk', 'DataBoxHeavy'

displayName.Description: The display name of the sku.

principalId.Description: Service Principal Id backing the Msi

transferType.Description: Type of the data transfer. Possible values include: 'ImportToAzure', 'ExportFromAzure'

isCancellable.Description: Describes whether the job is cancellable or not.

isDeletable.Description: Describes whether the job is deletable or not.

isShippingAddressEditable.Description: Describes whether the shipping address is editable or not.

isPrepareToShipEnabled.Description: Is Prepare To Ship Enabled on this job

status.Description: Name of the stage which is in progress. Possible values include: 'DeviceOrdered', 'DevicePrepared', 'Dispatched', 'Delivered', 'PickedUp', 'AtAzureDC', 'DataCopy', 'Completed', 'CompletedWithErrors', 'Cancelled', 'Failed_IssueReportedAtCustomer', 'Failed_IssueDetectedAtAzureDC', 'Aborted', 'CompletedWithWarnings', 'ReadyToDispatchFromAzureDC', 'ReadyToReceiveAtAzureDC'

startTime.Description: Time at which the job was started in UTC ISO 8601 format.

deliveryType.Description: Delivery type of Job. Possible values include: 'NonScheduled', 'Scheduled'

isCancellableWithoutFee.Description: Flag to indicate cancellation of scheduled job.

jobStages.Description: List of stages that run in the job.

shippingAddress.Description: Shipping address where customer wishes to receive the device.

dataImportDetails.Description: Details of the data to be imported into azure.

dataExportDetails.Description: Details of the data to be exported from azure.

reverseShipmentLabelSasKey.Description: Shared access key to download the return shipment label

chainOfCustodySasKey.Description: Shared access key to download the chain of custody logs

keyEncryptionKey.Description: Encryption key containing details about key to encrypt different keys.

expectedDataSizeInTeraBytes.Description: The expected size of the data, which needs to be transferred in this job, in terabytes.

stageName.Description: Name of the job stage. Possible values include: 'DeviceOrdered', 'DevicePrepared', 'Dispatched', 'Delivered', 'PickedUp', 'AtAzureDC', 'DataCopy', 'Completed', 'CompletedWithErrors', 'Cancelled', 'Failed_IssueReportedAtCustomer', 'Failed_IssueDetectedAtAzureDC', 'Aborted', 'CompletedWithWarnings', 'ReadyToDispatchFromAzureDC', 'ReadyToReceiveAtAzureDC'

displayName.Description: Display name of the job stage.

stageStatus.Description: Status of the job stage. Possible values include: 'None', 'InProgress', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Cancelled', 'Cancelling', 'SucceededWithErrors', 'WaitingForCustomerAction', 'SucceededWithWarnings'

stageTime.Description: Time for the job stage in UTC ISO 8601 format.

phone.Description: Phone number of the contact person.

phoneExtension.Description: Phone extension number of the contact person.

mobile.Description: Mobile number of the contact person.

emailList.Description: List of Email-ids to be notified about job progress.

notificationPreference.Description: Notification preference for a job stage.

stageName.Description: Name of the stage. Possible values include: 'DevicePrepared', 'Dispatched', 'Delivered', 'PickedUp', 'AtAzureDC', 'DataCopy'

stateOrProvince.Description: Name of the State or Province.

addressType.Description: Type of address. Possible values include: 'None', 'Residential', 'Commercial'

trackingUrl.Description: Url where shipment can be tracked.

accountDetails.Description: Account details of the data to be transferred

sharePassword.Description: Password for all the shares to be created on the device. Should not be passed for TransferType:ExportFromAzure jobs. If this is not passed, the service will generate password itself. This will not be returned in Get Call. Password Requirements :  Password must be minimum of 12 and maximum of 64 characters. Password must have at least one uppercase alphabet, one number and one special character. Password cannot have the following characters : IilLoO0 Password can have only alphabets, numbers and these characters : @#\-$%^!+=;:_()]+

resourceGroupId.Description: Resource Group Id of the compute disks.

stagingStorageAccountId.Description: Resource Id of the storage account that can be used to copy the vhd for staging.

transferConfiguration.Description: Configuration for defining the transfer of data.

logCollectionLevel.Description: Level of the logs to be collected. Possible values include: 'Error', 'Verbose'

accountDetails.Description: Account details of the data to be transferred

transferConfigurationType.Description: Type of the configuration for transfer. Possible values include: 'TransferAll', 'TransferUsingFilter'

transferFilterDetails.Description: Map of filter type and the details to filter. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferUsingFilter.

transferAllDetails.Description: Map of filter type and the details to transfer all data. This field is required only if the TransferConfigurationType is given as TransferAll

include.Description: Details of the filtering the transfer of data.

dataAccountType.Description: Type of the account of data. Possible values include: 'StorageAccount', 'ManagedDisk'

blobFilterDetails.Description: Filter details to transfer Azure Blobs

azureFileFilterDetails.Description: Filter details to transfer Azure files

filterFileDetails.Description: Details of the filter files to be used for data transfer.

blobPrefixList.Description: Prefix list of the Azure blobs to be transferred.

blobPathList.Description: List of full path of the blobs to be transferred.

containerList.Description: List of blob containers to be transferred.

filePrefixList.Description: Prefix list of the Azure files to be transferred.

filePathList.Description: List of full path of the files to be transferred.

fileShareList.Description: List of file shares to be transferred.

filterFileType.Description: Type of the filter file. Possible values include: 'AzureBlob', 'AzureFile'

filterFilePath.Description: Path of the file that contains the details of all items to transfer.

dataAccountType.Description: Type of the account of data. Possible values include: 'StorageAccount', 'ManagedDisk'

transferAllBlobs.Description: To indicate if all Azure blobs have to be transferred

transferAllFiles.Description: To indicate if all Azure Files have to be transferred

transportPreferences.Description: Preferences related to the shipment logistics of the sku

preferredShipmentType.Description: Indicates Shipment Logistics type that the customer preferred. Possible values include: 'CustomerManaged', 'MicrosoftManaged'

copyVerboseLogLink.Description: Link for copy verbose logs. This will be set only when LogCollectionLevel is set to Verbose.

copyLogDetailsType.Description: Copy log details for a storage account of a DataBox job
Copy Log Details for a disk

copyVerboseLogLink.Description: Link for copy verbose logs. This will be set only when the LogCollectionLevel is set to verbose.

copyLogDetailsType.Description: Copy log details for a storage account for Databox heavy

kekType.Description: Type of encryption key used for key encryption. Possible values include: 'MicrosoftManaged', 'CustomerManaged'

kekUrl.Description: Key encryption key. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.

kekVaultResourceID.Description: Kek vault resource id. It is required in case of Customer managed KekType.
